GUI

Class Popup

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Popup

  • public class Popup
extends java.lang.Object
    Popup represents the graphical view of most of the popup windows of Iscte Code Analyzer.

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • choosePopup

        private void choosePopup(int type)
        Filters which popup will be created
        Parameters:
        type - defines which popup will be created

      • getRuleAddCommons

        private void getRuleAddCommons(java.lang.String title,
                               Metric m1,
                               Metric m2,
                               Test test,
                               NormalRule rule)
        Generates general components of rule adding popups
        Parameters:
        title - title of rule being added
        m1 - first metric to be defined (LOC or ATFD)
        m2 - second metric to be defined (CYCLO or LAA)
        test - type of rule being added
        rule - indicated rule if popup window is edit type

      • addNewRule

        private void addNewRule(java.lang.String metric1,
                        java.lang.String metric2,
                        java.lang.String ruleName,
                        boolean and,
                        Test test)
        Adds a new rule to DataProcesser's rule list
        Parameters:
        metric1 - first metric (LOC or ATFD)
        metric2 - second metric (CYCLO or LAA)
        ruleName - unique name to identify different rules
        and - defines if AND or OR was selected (OR = !AND)
        test - sets type of rule being added

      • openLongRuleAdd

        private void openLongRuleAdd(NormalRule rule)
        Opens a popup to add a new IsLongMethod rule
        Parameters:
        rule - rule to be edited

      • openFeatureRuleAdd

        private void openFeatureRuleAdd(NormalRule rule)
        Opens a popup to add a new IsFeatureEnvy rule
        Parameters:
        rule - rule to be edited

      • radioListener

        private void radioListener(javax.swing.JRadioButton and,
                           javax.swing.JRadioButton or)
        Sets listeners to AND and OR radio buttons
        Parameters:
        and - first radio button to add listener
        or - second radio button to add listener

      • openPickATest

        private void openPickATest()
        Opens a popup to choose, from the rule list, the rule that will be analyzed

      • showPopup

        private void showPopup(MainFrame frame)
        Used by every popup. Sets the popup visible and shows it in the screen
        Parameters:
        frame - frame to set visible
